mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, PWD, USER_NAME, MOBILE, EMAIL, BIRTH, IN_DATE, IN_USER_ID, UP_DATE, UP_USER_ID from suser
mapper.update: insert into suser ( USER_ID, PWD, USER_NAME, MOBILE, EMAIL, BIRTH, IN_DATE, IN_USER_ID, UP_DATE, UP_USER_ID ) values ( :1, :2, :3, :4, :5, :6, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :7, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), :8 )
update suser set PWD=:1, USER_NAME=:2, MOBILE=:3, EMAIL=:4, BIRTH=:5, UP_DATE=to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD.HH24MISS'), UP_USER_ID=:6 where USER_ID=:7
